summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Virtual Try-On feature for Divine Aura e-commerce website. All core Virtual Studio functionality working correctly - 100% success rate for feature tests.
passed_tests: Navigation: 'Aura Virtual Studio' link appears in navbar and routes to /virtual-studio
Virtual Studio Page: Loads at /virtual-studio with proper 'Aura Virtual Studio' header
Category Selection: Lipstick, Blush, Strobe Cream tabs work correctly
Default Category: Lipstick is selected by default
Shade Selection: Peach Veil (Lipstick), Soft Petal (Blush), Pearl Glow (Strobe) all appear correctly
Intensity Slider: Light/Medium/Bold buttons appear after selecting a shade
Intensity Toggle: Clicking intensity buttons changes selection state
Product Page 18 (Peach Veil Lipstick): 'Try This Shade in Aura Studio' button present
Product Page 19 (Soft Petal Blush): 'Try This Shade in Aura Studio' button present
Product Page 20 (Pearl Glow Strobe): 'Try This Shade in Aura Studio' button present
Query Params: Clicking 'Try This Shade' navigates to /virtual-studio with correct cat and shade params
Pre-selection: When navigating from product page, shade is pre-selected in Virtual Studio
tryOnEnabled Flag: Products without tryOnEnabled (e.g., ID 1) do NOT show Try Shade button
Homepage CTA: 'Not sure about shades?' block appears with 'Try Aura Studio' button
Homepage CTA Navigation: Button correctly navigates to /virtual-studio
Add to Cart: Adding selected shade from Virtual Studio adds product to cart
Cart Integration: Cart badge updates after adding item from Virtual Studio
Cart Contents: Product appears correctly in cart page with correct price
Mobile Navigation: Aura Virtual Studio link visible and functional in mobile nav bar
Mobile Virtual Studio: Page renders correctly on mobile viewport

fixes_applied.issue: data-testid generation only replaced first space, causing 'aura-virtual studio' instead of 'aura-virtual-studio'
fixes_applied.fix: Changed .replace(' ', '-') to .replace(/ /g, '-') for global space replacement

seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - feature uses local JavaScript data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Virtual Try-On feature fully tested. All 10 test scenarios passed. Minor fix applied to Navbar.jsx for consistent test-id generation. Products 18-20 have tryOnEnabled=true. Demo shades: Peach Veil (lipstick), Soft Petal (blush), Pearl Glow (strobe cream).
